messages.subject: Owatonna Unschooling Gathering- Minnesota- Counting Down!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: We are counting down to our  unschooling adventure at the  Great Serengeti Indoor Waterpark Owatonna, Minnesota Thursday & Friday, Feb. 26th and 27th
messages.messageBody:
We are counting down to our
 unschooling adventure at the
 Great Serengeti Indoor Waterpark
Owatonna, Minnesota
Thursday & Friday,
Feb. 26th and 27th


Thursday Water Park hours:  3:00PM- 9:00PM
Friday                                    9:00AM-10:00PM


http://www.hiowatonna.com/
Book your room at: 507-446-8900 Group Name--M.U.S. (MN Un-Schoolers)
(Located inside award winning Holiday
Inn/behind Cabella's--1 hour South of Minneapolis & 3 hours north of Des Moines) http://www.hiowatonna.com

Join the Yahoo List and add your name to the database, if desired and see "who is coming."
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/owung/%c2%a0

Wristbands
for the waterpark is to use the day of arrival (see waterpark hours) and check
out day until 11am. Check in is 4pm. The wristbands are $6 person for homeschoolers.
Prices vary depending on day of the week. It is normally $10 through the week and $12 on the weekend.

See you there!!!!!!!!!

Alex Polikowsky- My cel is 507-250-1833

PS-We may have a storm on Thursday-we are keeping an eye on it. IF the roads are not safe Thursday we WILL be there on Friday at 9:00AM but will not be there Thrusday night. Feel free to call me.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
